dirstack - keep a list of recently visited directories to choose from, invoke

git-fixup.description: Display a menu with commits to choose from to create a fixup commit.

git-pv.description: Preview commits and show or print selected commit.

git-rmb.description: git rmb - select a branch to remove remote and locally.

git-lstree.brief: git lstree - Print a tree of files from ls-files
git-lstree.description: git lstree - Print a tree of files from ls-files

hhdiff.brief: Multiple diff formats - colorize intraline diffs
hhdiff.description:
Multiple diff formats - colorize intraline diffs.

* ndiff:    lists every line and highlights interline changes.
* context:  highlights clusters of changes in a before/after format.
* unified:  highlights clusters of changes in an inline format.
* html:     generates side by side comparison with change highlights.

sshansible.brief: SSH to hostnames in an ansible-inventory using "ansible_host" address instead of name resolution
sshansible.description:
SSH to hostnames in an ansible-inventory using "ansible_host" address instead
of name resolution.

Given an inventory file like this:

    [buildslaves]
    foo     ansible_host=192.0.2.1

Running 'sshansible.py -- -v foo', will exec the command:
  ssh -o Hostname=192.0.2.1 -v foo

That way any config in 'ssh_config' for host 'foo' will still be honored.

scp:
    sshansible.py --scp bar -- /etc/foo.conf bar:/tmp

fzfdirs.brief: fzfdirs - print bookmarked directories to feed to fzf
fzfdirs.description:
fzfdirs - print bookmarked directories to feed to fzf.

Shell function `cdg` opens fzf with the list of bookmarks and cd to the selected path.
`cdg -e` to open bookmarks file in $EDITOR.
